channel.title: Making Shops. Gr... Confuzed
channel.description: OK, I know how to add items to my shop, problem is, I want to make a shop. Can anyone give me a tutorial link to one? I have already added the NPC. I just need to know how to make it able to trade and open the shop interface.

item.description:
@Demi_Sphere wrote:

OK, I know how to add items to my shop, problem is, I want to make a shop. Can anyone give me a tutorial link to one? I have already added the NPC. I just need to know how to make it able to trade and open the shop interface.
